nodes.text: A sentient pink-skinned pachydermoid species existed in the galaxy that was short of stature with large three-fingered hands and two-toed feet. The species had a prominent trunk and tusks, but lacked visible ears.
A pirate of this species appeared in the the book The Pirates of Tarnoonga: A Droid Adventure. Another was briefly seen as a slave aboard the Roon Clipper in "Across the Roon Sea."
This Wookieepedia article inspired Delilah S. Dawson to include this species in her canon comic Star Wars Adventures 25.
